name: Hexrogue
description:
"Hexrogue" is a turn-based strategy roguelike game where you need to survive on a hex board that changes every time you play.

Strategy
Players can consume Action Points (AP) of a limited amount each turn to perform various actions such as "move," "attack," and "build."

Fill the board with necessary buildings such as "villages" that automatically attack enemies, "mines" or "plantation" that produce resources every turn, "workshops" for crafting equipment, and defeat enemies that appear each turn. Let's conquer the island.

Class
Select one class from three to play. Each class will have different abilities and play style.

Growth
Defeat enemies to level up, through which you can get powerful Perks.
Perks appear randomly and it is up to you what to choose. The combination of Perks is essential in the game.

Randomness
Everything from the map to enemies, dropped equipment, Perk options are randomized. Each run is a new challenge.

Power-ups
You can purchase various power-ups with coins to help you progress faster or change the play style according to your preference. Coins are earned each run you play even if it fails.
